code: import{useState}from"react";import{Button}from"@/components/ui/button";import{Input}from"@/components/ui/input";import{Label}from"@/components/ui/label";import{Card,CardContent,CardDescription,CardHeader,CardTitle}from"@/components/ui/card";import{Lock}from"lucide-react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AdminLogin(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(password==="software"){onLogin();}else{setError("Incorrect password");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-900 flex items-center justify-center p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardHeader,{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Lock,{className:"w-12 h-12 text-orange-500"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-white",children:"Admin Access"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardDescription,{className:"text-gray-400",children:"Enter password to access the admin panel"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{htmlFor:"password",className:"text-white",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{id:"password",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"bg-gray-800 border-gray-600 text-white focus:border-orange-500",placeholder:"Enter admin password",required:true})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 text-sm",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-700 text-white",children:"Access Admin Panel"})]})})]})});}
